vested.translation[0].definitions[0].def: vested rights, powers, property etc belong to you and cannot be removed
vested.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Shareholders have a vested right to 10% per annum.
vested.translation[0].definitions[1].def: having full rights to own or have something
vested.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He only took the job to get vested in the pension fund.
